channel.title: Orical-X - Perfect skilling! TESTERS NEEDED
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/14c5o2x.jpg[/img] [center]Hi moparscape, some of you may know a server development I was involved in called Miscellania. I would have loved to have kept on programming the client while X Entinity X was the server sided person. But he seems to have quit on me. And recently, I've realized how [b]terrible[/b] the skilling on Project-Insanity is. My goal for this development is mainly to improve the skilling of my server. I've already been doing this for about a week and I've fixed fishing a tiny bit and I'm working on agility now. So, lets move onto the good stuff.[/center] Goals: [ul][li]Make the PI hater's not hate my server :D[/li] [li]atleast 3 skills 90%+[/li] [li]Full Karamja agility course[/li] [li]All skills trainable[/li] [li]Great mining[/li] [li]Great Woodcutting[/li] [li]Great fishing[/li] [li]PERFECT Firemaking[/li] [li]The only skills atm that are up to my standards quality wise are smithing and slayer.[/li][/ul] Skills I plan on improving(no specific order): [ul][li]Fishing[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Farming[/li][/ul] Atm, i'm working on Agility, as I just finished up the last bits of fishing. Developers log:
[b]March 24, 2011:[/b] Started project Fixed curses, now 95% Added x10 hits + command to turn on and/or off Moved fishing & cooking to fishing guild Fixed the glitch where you got tuna from the lobster spot Implemented a better agility system Started on my own Karamja agility course Made planks, balance rope, log balance, hands hold, monkey bars and the blade thingy work. [b]March 25, 2011:[/b] Not much done today, was playing alot of basket ball Jumping pillars work, along with low wall and swing rope. Recruited the worst beta tester ever, Clawz fury <===8 Balancing ledge works. AMG, finished the agility course! All clickable objects work, I have no intention of adding the ones that arent clickable, as I've already added one and it doesn't even look that great and I can only get it to work in 1 direction. [b]March 27, 2011:[/b] Made the agility course video
Media: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/a11qo8.jpg[/img] For the blade one, where I'm jumping, I did that really crapy. I made a boolean to detect if the player is within the reach of a blade and it makes them do the jump anim and move +2 squares. I don't know of any better ways to do this atm. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/16j26fs.jpg[/img] This is actually changable, say if you don't like how it looks on a 474 gameframe, you can turn the orbs off. Or if you want them for pking/monster killing you can easily turn it back on. Client sided command to change it. Also have a command for x10 hits. Video of the finished course coming soon! [b]Supporters:[/b] Rash <3 beast k0 <3 AzyreK <3 mr extremez <3 Mendorphins <3 Maikie61 <3 halflive9 <3 Ix Soulcist xI <3 marcbob <3 Clawz fury ~<===8 smokin flax <3 So atm, all I need are beta testers. I'll probably be programming this by myself, so unless you are like, 2x better then me, don't even try :D Current beta testers: Claws fury This can be you! This can be you! Beta tester: [code]Timezone: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Have you ever had a homosexual fantasy?: Do you like to skill(Agility, firemaking, fishing.. ect)?: Do you have msn? if so, what is it?: [/code] Please, I really need beta tester's!!!

item.title: Orical-X - Perfect skilling! TESTERS NEEDED
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:


[center]Hi moparscape, some of you may know a server development I was involved in called Miscellania. I would have loved to have kept on programming the client while
X Entinity X was the server sided person.
But he seems to have quit on me.
And recently, I’ve realized how terrible the skilling on Project-Insanity is.
My goal for this development is mainly to improve the skilling of my server.
I’ve already been doing this for about a week and I’ve fixed fishing a tiny bit and I’m working on agility now.
So, lets move onto the good stuff.[/center]

Goals:

[ul][li]Make the PI hater’s not hate my server :D[/li]
[li]atleast 3 skills 90%+[/li]
[li]Full Karamja agility course[/li]
[li]All skills trainable[/li]
[li]Great mining[/li]
[li]Great Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Great fishing[/li]
[li]PERFECT Firemaking[/li]
[li]The only skills atm that are up to my standards quality wise are smithing and slayer.[/li][/ul]

Skills I plan on improving(no specific order):

[ul][li]Fishing[/li]
[li]Agility[/li]
[li]Mining[/li]
[li]Cooking[/li]
[li]Firemaking[/li]
[li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Farming[/li][/ul]

Atm, i’m working on Agility, as I just finished up the last bits of fishing.

Developers log:

[b]March 24, 2011:[/b] Started project Fixed curses, now 95% Added x10 hits + command to turn on and/or off Moved fishing & cooking to fishing guild Fixed the glitch where you got tuna from the lobster spot Implemented a better agility system Started on my own Karamja agility course Made planks, balance rope, log balance, hands hold, monkey bars and the blade thingy work.

March 25, 2011:
Not much done today, was playing alot of basket ball
Jumping pillars work, along with low wall and swing rope.
Recruited the worst beta tester ever, Clawz fury <===8
Balancing ledge works.
AMG, finished the agility course! All clickable objects work, I have no intention of adding the ones that arent clickable, as I’ve already added one and it doesn’t even look that great and I can only get it to work in 1 direction.

March 27, 2011:
Made the agility course video

Media:

For the blade one, where I’m jumping, I did that really crapy. I made a boolean to detect if the player is within the reach of a blade and it makes them do the jump anim and move +2 squares. I don’t know of any better ways to do this atm.


This is actually changable, say if you don’t like how it looks on a 474 gameframe, you can turn the orbs off. Or if you want them for pking/monster killing you can easily turn it back on.
Client sided command to change it. Also have a command for x10 hits.

Video of the finished course coming soon!

Supporters:
Rash <3
beast k0 <3
AzyreK <3
mr extremez <3
Mendorphins <3
Maikie61 <3
halflive9 <3
Ix Soulcist xI <3
marcbob <3
Clawz fury ~<===8
smokin flax <3

So atm, all I need are beta testers. I’ll probably be programming this by myself, so unless you are like, 2x better then me, don’t even try

Current beta testers:
Claws fury
This can be you!
This can be you!

Beta tester:

Timezone: How active will you be: Any experience in this?: Have you ever had a homosexual fantasy?: Do you like to skill(Agility, firemaking, fishing.. ect)?: Do you have msn? if so, what is it?:

Please, I really need beta tester’s!!!

Read full topic
